title: Ygg, the Lucky Stray
mainText: {kw:On Bid} â€” During this bid you are immune to all negative effects performed by other players. If Ygg has succesfully protected you from a negative effect, place it into your discard pile instead of trashing it.
flavourText: Did Karina lose her cat again? I swear it's the 66th time already! - Lagertha, the Paladin.
